item.title: OCaml Weekly News, 02 Jan 2024
item.description:
1. castore 0.0.1 – a portable CA Store with no dependencies
  2. fixgen 0.1.0 - a CLI tool for generating fixtures
  3. 8 months of OCaml after 8 years of Haskell in production
  4. riot 0.0.7 – an actor-model multi-core scheduler for OCaml 5
  5. Spatial Shell · A windows switcher for i3 and sway implemented in OCaml
  6. Other OCaml News
